title: Advanced Satellite Image Classification and Segmentation with Keras and EuroSAT
summary:
A 24-session track pairing twelve deep-dive lectures with twelve labs to extend the core EuroSAT curriculum.

  • Prototype advanced augmentation, transfer learning, and temporal modeling techniques.
  • Harden segmentation workflows for deployment, monitoring, and stakeholder delivery.
  • Blend EuroSAT with companion datasets to test generalization.
  • Produce production-ready assets through iterative lab sprints.
